thread.section_title: Solar Market Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Market | www.solarmarket.com.au
thread.title: James Bergin
thread.title_full: Solar Market reviewed by James Bergin

author: James Bergin
title: James Bergin
text: I found that the team from MC Electrical, recommended by Solar Market, performed an outstanding job installing our solar System. The tradesmen were very professional, knew their product, and were courteous and polite. We were very impressed that they all wore the Company uniform. They inspired confidence and went out of their way to inform us about the system. I would recommend this Company anytime. Congratulations. Well done MC Electrical.
